playbook_text:
ACE Playbook Insights
Use these distilled reminders to plan tool usage. Keep tool calls faithful to the functions provided in the BFCL benchmark.
No insights recorded yet.

reflection.reasoning: The model failed because it didn't make any tool calls in turn 0, instead asking for the stock symbol rather than using available lookup functionality.
reflection.error_identification: Missing get_stock_info call in turn 0 when user asked about Zeta Corp's stock performance, despite having get_symbol_by_name available.
reflection.root_cause_analysis: The model unnecessarily deferred to user input for the stock symbol instead of proactively using the symbol lookup tool to fulfill the stock information request.
reflection.correct_approach: Should have immediately used get_symbol_by_name to find Zeta Corp's symbol, then called get_stock_info with the resolved symbol to provide the requested stock performance data.
reflection.key_insight: When users ask about company stock performance, models should leverage available symbol lookup tools rather than asking for symbols, especially when company names are clearly provided.

messages.content: You are the ACE Curator. Convert reflections into crisp playbook operations per tool group. Prefer modifying existing bullets when possible, but keep different concepts separate. Only generalize when the evaluation summary indicates a systemic issue, but otherwise don't overgeneralize bullet points. Generally respect the BFCL evaluation but think about what you would want to tell the model in order for it to improve in the many cases it may face in the future.keep the playbook unchanged on successes unless an existing entry now conflicts with verified behaviour. Functional parity with the checker matters more than superficial differences . Output JSON.
